languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}Вы сервиторизовали{/d} ту девицу, Мейв — суровое и правильное решение. Теперь враг не сможет вновь воспользоваться ее наивностью".

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}Вы сервиторизовали ту девицу, Мейв{/d} — суровое и правильное решение. Теперь враг не сможет вновь воспользоваться ее наивностью".

languages.text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}Вы сервиторизовали{/d} ту девицу, Мейв — суровое и правильное решение. Теперь враг не сможет вновь воспользоваться ее наивностью".

traits.locale_text: "You servitorised that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. People as naive as her always end up as weapons in the enemy's hands."
"You servitorised that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. People as naive as her always end up as weapons in the enemy's hands."

"You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."

languages.text: 「あなたはあの若い女性、メイヴを{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}サーヴィター化{/d}しました。厳しい措置ではありますが、正しい判断でした。これで敵は彼女の無知に再び付け込むことはできないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはあの若い女性、メイヴをサーヴィター化しました。厳しい措置ではありますが、正しい判断でした。これで敵は彼女の無知に再び付け込むことはできないでしょう」
「あなたはあの若い女性、メイヴをサーヴィター化しました。厳しい措置ではありますが、正しい判断でした。これで敵は彼女の無知に再び付け込むことはできないでしょう」

languages.text: "Ihr habt diese junge Frau, Maive, {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}zum Servitor gemacht{/d} – eine harte Maßnahme, aber die Entscheidung war richtig. Jetzt kann der Feind ihre Naivität nicht mehr ausnutzen."
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt diese junge Frau, Maive, zum Servitor gemacht – eine harte Maßnahme, aber die Entscheidung war richtig. Jetzt kann der Feind ihre Naivität nicht mehr ausnutzen."
"Ihr habt diese junge Frau, Maive, zum Servitor gemacht – eine harte Maßnahme, aber die Entscheidung war richtig. Jetzt kann der Feind ihre Naivität nicht mehr ausnutzen."

languages.text: « Vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorisé{/d} cette jeune femme, Maive. Cette sanction était peut-être sévère, mais elle était juste. L'ennemi ne pourra plus jamais profiter de sa naïveté. »
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez servitorisé cette jeune femme, Maive. Cette sanction était peut-être sévère, mais elle était juste. L'ennemi ne pourra plus jamais profiter de sa naïveté. »
« Vous avez servitorisé cette jeune femme, Maive. Cette sanction était peut-être sévère, mais elle était juste. L'ennemi ne pourra plus jamais profiter de sa naïveté. »

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}Ha mandado servidorizar{/d} a esa muchacha, Maive; una medida drástica, pero creo que ha sido la correcta. Ahora el enemigo ya no podrá volver a aprovecharse de su ingenuidad».
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."

traits.locale_text: «Ha mandado servidorizar a esa muchacha, Maive; una medida drástica, pero creo que ha sido la correcta. Ahora el enemigo ya no podrá volver a aprovecharse de su ingenuidad».
«Ha mandado servidorizar a esa muchacha, Maive; una medida drástica, pero creo que ha sido la correcta. Ahora el enemigo ya no podrá volver a aprovecharse de su ingenuidad».

languages.text: “你把那个叫做梅芙的年轻女人{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}改造成了机仆{/d}，这是个相当严厉的措施，但也是正确的选择。如今，她的天真再也无法成为敌人的突破口了。”
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."

traits.locale_text: “你把那个叫做梅芙的年轻女人改造成了机仆，这是个相当严厉的措施，但也是正确的选择。如今，她的天真再也无法成为敌人的突破口了。”
“你把那个叫做梅芙的年轻女人改造成了机仆，这是个相当严厉的措施，但也是正确的选择。如今，她的天真再也无法成为敌人的突破口了。”

languages.text: "O genç kadını, Maive'yi {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}hizmetörleştirdiniz{/d}. Sert bir önlem ama doğru bir karardı. Düşmanlarımız artık onun saflığından faydalanamayacak."
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_LizzyServDecision}servitorised{/d} that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."

traits.locale_text: "O genç kadını, Maive'yi hizmetörleştirdiniz. Sert bir önlem ama doğru bir karardı. Düşmanlarımız artık onun saflığından faydalanamayacak."
"O genç kadını, Maive'yi hizmetörleştirdiniz. Sert bir önlem ama doğru bir karardı. Düşmanlarımız artık onun saflığından faydalanamayacak."

languages.original_text: "You servitorised that young woman, Maive — a severe measure, but it was the right call. Now the enemy won't be able to take advantage of her naivety again."
